00023 /*
00024 ** Definition of the Constructor and Destructor
00025 */
00026 clGeometryFrame::clGeometryFrame(wxAuiNotebook *parent, const wxString& title, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, const long style, clGeometry *geo):
00027                            wxPanel(parent, wxID_ANY, pos, size, style, title)
00028 {
00029   canvas      = NULL;
00030   geometry    = geo;
00031   parentFrame = parent;
00032   SetUpCanvas();
00033 }

00035 clGeometryFrame::~clGeometryFrame(void)
00036 {
00037   if(canvas)   delete canvas;
00038 
00039 //  geometry managed by parentFrame; do NOT delete
00040 //  if(geometry) delete geometry;

00043 /*
00044 ** Methods for drawing
00045 */
00046 void clGeometryFrame::BuildVertexArray(tpArray<GLfloat> *vertexArray, tpArray<int> *highLightArray) const
00047 {
00048   try
00049   {
00050     int numSurf = geometry->GetNumberSurfaces();
00051     for(int s=0; s<numSurf; s++)
00052     {
00053       clSurface *surf = geometry->GetSurfacePointer(s);
00054 
00055       int numPatch = surf->GetNumberPatches();
00056       for(int p=0; p<numPatch; p++)
00057       {
00058         // First point
00059         clPatch          *patch = surf->GetPatchPointer(p);
00060         tpMatrix<double> coord  = patch->GetCoordinates(0.0f, 0.0f);
00061 
00062         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,1));
00063         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,2));
00064         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,3));
00065 
00066         // Second point
00067         coord = patch->GetCoordinates(1.0f, 0.0f);
00068         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,1));
00069         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,2));
00070         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,3));
00071 
00072         // Third point
00073         coord = patch->GetCoordinates(1.0f, 1.0f);
00074         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,1));
00075         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,2));
00076         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,3));
00077 
00078         // Fourth point
00079         coord = patch->GetCoordinates(0.0f, 1.0f);
00080         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,1));
00081         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,2));
00082         vertexArray->AddItem(coord(1,3));
00083       }
00084     }
00085   }
00086 
00087   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00088   {
00089     EX.AddMethodToTree("clGeometryFrame::BuildVertexArray");
00090     throw(EX);
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 void clGeometryFrame::SetUpCanvas(void)
00095 {
00096   try
00097   {
00098     GLfloat xMin = geometry->GetMinX();
00099     GLfloat xMax = geometry->GetMaxX();
00100     GLfloat yMin = geometry->GetMinY();
00101     GLfloat yMax = geometry->GetMaxY();
00102     GLfloat zMin = geometry->GetMinZ();
00103     GLfloat zMax = geometry->GetMaxZ();
00104 
00105     tpArray<GLfloat> *vertexArray    = new tpArray<GLfloat>;
00106     tpArray<int>     *highLightArray = new tpArray<int>;
00107     BuildVertexArray(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00108 
00109     /*
00110     ** Initialise the canvas
00111     */
00112     wxBoxSizer* sizer;
00113     sizer = new wxBoxSizer( wxHORIZONTAL );
00114 
00115     canvas = new clCanvas(this, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxDEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE, "clCanvas", dsFilled, GL_QUADS);
00116     sizer->Add( canvas, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL, 5 );
00117     SetSizer(sizer);
00118 
00119     canvas->SetMaxima(xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax, zMin, zMax);
00120     canvas->SetRotations(-30.0f, 30.0f, 0.0f);
00121     canvas->SetTranslations( -0.5*(xMin+xMax), -0.5*(yMin+yMax), -0.5*(zMin+zMax));
00122     canvas->SetScaleFactor(1.0f);
00123     canvas->SetVertices(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00124 
00125 //    canvas->DrawIt();
00126 
00127     Show();
00128   }
00129 
00130   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00131   {
00132     EX.AddMethodToTree("clGeometryFrame::SetUpCanvas");
00133     throw(EX);
00134   }
00135 }

00140 void clGeometryFrame::OnClose(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00141 {
00142   ((clParentFrame *)parentFrame)->CloseFile();
00143   Close(TRUE);
00144 }
00145 
00146 void clGeometryFrame::OnActivate(wxActivateEvent& event)
00147 {
00148   if (event.GetActive() && canvas)
00149   {
00150     canvas->SetCurrent();
00151   }
00152 }
